column4: hey, sorta off topic, i have a dell that had ubuntu on it, the processor died, so i want to take the hard drive out and put it in a external case to read the files.  I have one, and it takes a pin connection, however this harddrive looks to have only 4 pins and 2 flat chip connection things, i was unaware of different connections, what do i need?
sata, dang are there converting connection things?
